Class Driver

  • java.lang.Object
    • a4_JonahKubath.Driver

  • public class Driver
extends java.lang.Object
    Driver - this is the main driver for the application. Receives the user's choice and selects the appropriate database action to take.
    Author:
    Jonah Kubath

        public static int getInput()

        Parameters:
